LiteLoader 1.12.0

Package com.mumfrey.liteloader.modconfig

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AbstractConfigPanel.ConfigOptionListener<T extends GuiButton>
    A callback for a control click event.
    AbstractConfigPanel.ConfigTextField
    A handle to an option text field, used to get and retrieve text and set the max length.
    AdvancedExposable
    Interface for Exposables which want a finer degree of control over the serialisation process.
    ConfigPanel
    Interface for mod config panels to implement
    ConfigPanelHost
    Interface for object which can host configuration panels
    Exposable
    Base interface for objects which can support the ExposeConfig annotations
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractConfigPanel
    A general-purpose base class for mod config panels which implements a lot of the boilerplate needed to create a simple config panel.
    CloudConfig
    Convenience class for mods to work with cloud-based config.
    ConfigManager
    Registry where we keep the mod config panel classes and config file writers
    ExposableConfigWriter
    Manages serialisation of exposable properties to a JSON config file via Gson
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ConfigStrategy
    Configuration management strategy
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    ExposableOptions
    Annotation which can be a applied to mod classes to indicate that members decorated with the Gson Expose annotation should be serialised with Gson.
